params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying the account would borrow
params.borrower: The account which would borrow the asset
params.mToken: The market to verify the borrow against

params.mTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.mTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.repayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid

params.mToken: The market to verify the mint against
params.minter: The account which would get the minted tokens

params.mToken: The market to verify the redeem against
params.redeemTokens: The number of mTokens to exchange for the underlying asset in the market
params.redeemer: The account which would redeem the tokens

params.borrower: The account which would borrowed the asset
params.mToken: The market to verify the repay against

params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral
params.mTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.mTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized

params.dst: The account which receives the tokens
params.mToken: The market to verify the transfer against
params.src: The account which sources the tokens
params.transferTokens: The number of mTokens to transfer

params.mToken: The market to verify the transfer against

params.account: The address of the account to check

returns._0: True if the account is in the asset, otherwise false.

checkOutflowVolumeLimit(uint256).details: Sender must be a listed market

params.holder: The address to claim MALDA for
The address to claim MALDA for
params.mTokens: The list of markets to claim MALDA in

params.borrowers: Whether or not to claim MALDA earned by borrowing
params.holders: The addresses to claim MALDA for
params.mTokens: The list of markets to claim MALDA in
params.suppliers: Whether or not to claim MALDA earned by supplying

params._mTokens: The list of addresses of the mToken markets to be enabled

exitMarket(address).details: Sender must not have an outstanding borrow balance in the asset,  or be providing necessary collateral for an outstanding borrow.

params._mToken: The address of the asset to be removed

returns._0: account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,          account shortfall below collateral requirements)

params._user: The address of the account to pull assets for

returns.mTokens: A dynamic list with the assets the account has entered

params.account: The account to determine liquidity for
params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying to hypothetically borrow
params.mTokenModify: The market to hypothetically redeem/borrow in
params.redeemTokens: The number of tokens to hypothetically redeem

returns._0: hypothetical account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,         hypothetical account shortfall below collateral requirements)

isDeprecated(address).details: All borrows in a deprecated mToken market can be immediately liquidated

params.mToken: The market to check if deprecated

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of mTokenBorrowed underlying to convert into mTokenCollateral tokens
params.mTokenBorrowed: The address of the borrowed mToken
params.mTokenCollateral: The address of the collateral mToken

returns._0: number of mTokenCollateral tokens to be seized in a liquidation

accountAssets(address,uint256).notice: Per-account mapping of "assets you are in", capped by maxAssets

afterMTokenMint(address).notice: Validates mint and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

beforeMTokenBorrow(address,address,uint2.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to borrow the underlying asset of the given market

beforeMTokenLiquidate(address,address,ad.notice: Checks if the liquidation should be allowed to occur

beforeMTokenMint(address,address).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to mint tokens in the given market

beforeMTokenRedeem(address,address,uint2.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to redeem tokens in the given market

beforeMTokenRepay(address,address).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to repay a borrow in the given market

beforeMTokenSeize(address,address,addres.notice: Checks if the seizing of assets should be allowed to occur

beforeMTokenTransfer(address,address,add.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to transfer tokens in the given market

beforeRebalancing(address).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to rebalance tokens

borrowCaps(address).notice: Borrow caps enforced by borrowAllowed for each mToken address. Defaults to zero which corresponds to unlimited borrowing.

checkMembership(address,address).notice: Returns whether the given account is entered in the given asset

checkOutflowVolumeLimit(uint256).notice: Checks if new used amount is within the limits of the outflow volume limit

claimMalda(address).notice: Claim all the MALDA accrued by holder in all markets

claimMalda(address,address[]).notice: Claim all the MALDA accrued by holder in the specified markets

claimMalda(address[],address[],bool,bool.notice: Claim all MALDA accrued by the holders

closeFactorMantissa().notice: Multiplier used to calculate the maximum repayAmount when liquidating a borrow

enterMarkets(address[]).notice: Add assets to be included in account liquidity calculation

enterMarketsWithSender(address).notice: Add asset (msg.sender) to be included in account liquidity calculation

exitMarket(address).notice: Removes asset from sender's account liquidity calculation

getAccountLiquidity(address).notice: Determine the current account liquidity wrt collateral requirements

getAssetsIn(address).notice: Returns the assets an account has entered

getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity(address,.notice: Determine what the account liquidity would be if the given amounts were redeemed/borrowed

getUSDValueForAllMarkets().notice: Returns USD value for all markets

isDeprecated(address).notice: Returns true if the given mToken market has been deprecated

lastOutflowResetTimestamp().notice: Should return last reset time for outflow check

liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens(address,ad.notice: Calculate number of tokens of collateral asset to seize given an underlying amount

liquidationIncentiveMantissa(address).notice: Multiplier representing the discount on collateral that a liquidator receives

markets(address).notice: Official mapping of mTokens -> Market metadata

oracleOperator().notice: Oracle which gives the price of any given asset

outflowResetTimeWindow().notice: Should return the outflow volume time window

rewardDistributor().notice: Reward Distributor to markets supply and borrow (including protocol token)

setPaused(address,uint8,bool).notice: Set pause for a specific operation

supplyCaps(address).notice: Supply caps enforced by supplyAllowed for each mToken address. Defaults to zero which corresponds to unlimited supplying.
